Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
This_Package_Is_Cursed_Do_Not_Ever_Try_To_Change_Name_Or_It_Will_Explode.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
The core logic engine for the game.

This class maintains the state of the entire battlefield, including units, turrets, bases, projectiles, and currency. It handles the game loop (tick) updates, enemy AI spawning, combat calculations, and win/loss conditions.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(int startingCurrency, int baseHp)
      Initializes the game manager with starting currency and base health.
      Parameters:
      startingCurrency - The initial amount of currency for the player.
      baseHp - The maximum and initial health for both player and enemy bases.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public GameManager.GameState tick()
      Updates the game state for a single frame (tick).

      This method handles currency regeneration, cooldowns, unit training, enemy AI spawning, turret updates, unit movement and collision, projectile updates, and win/loss condition checks.

      Returns:
      The current state of the game (ONGOING, PLAYER_WIN, or ENEMY_WIN).

    • queueUnit

      public boolean queueUnit(Unit unit)
      Adds the specified unit to the training queue if the queue is not full and the player has enough currency.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit to be added to the queue.
      Returns:
      true if the unit was successfully queued, false otherwise.

    • spawnPlayerUnit

      public void spawnPlayerUnit(Unit unit)
      Spawns a player unit at the player's spawn coordinate.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit to spawn.

    • spawnEnemyUnit

      public void spawnEnemyUnit(Unit unit)
      Spawns an enemy unit at the enemy's spawn coordinate.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit to spawn.

    • placePlayerTurret

      public int placePlayerTurret(Turret turret)
      Places a turret on the player's base if the player can afford it and the base has capacity.
      Parameters:
      turret - The turret to place.
      Returns:
      The slot index where the turret was placed, or -1 if placement failed.

    • sellTurret

      public void sellTurret(int slotIndex)
      Sells the turret at the specified slot index, removing it and refunding a portion of its cost.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the turret slot to sell.

    • useAbility

      public boolean useAbility(SpecialAbility ability, List<Unit> targets)
      Activates a special ability on the given targets if the ability is ready and affordable.
      Parameters:
      ability - The ability to use.
      targets - The list of potential target units.
      Returns:
      true if the ability was successfully used, false otherwise.

    • upgradeUnitAttack

      public void upgradeUnitAttack(int cost)
      Upgrades the attack power of all current and future player units.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the upgrade.

    • upgradeUnitHp

      public void upgradeUnitHp(int cost)
      Upgrades the health points of all current and future player units.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the upgrade.

    • upgradeTurretAttack

      public void upgradeTurretAttack(int cost)
      Upgrades the attack power of all turrets.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the upgrade.

    • upgradeTurretRange

      public void upgradeTurretRange(int cost)
      Upgrades the range of all turrets.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the upgrade.

    • upgradeBaseCapacity

      public void upgradeBaseCapacity(int cost)
      Upgrades the turret slot capacity of the player's base.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the upgrade.

    • getCurrencySystem

      Returns:
      The CurrencySystem object.

      Returns the unit currently being trained.
      Returns:
